samples.context: Heterotrophic nutrition is typical of animals. These organisms eat organic matter in other organisms —either alive (as hunters) or dead (as scavengers).
samples.question: What type of nutrition do animals rely on?

samples.context: Saprotrophic organisms are the decay organisms. They digest dead materials using enzymes that they secrete externally.
samples.question: How do saprotrophic organisms digest materials?
